Reviews.Title: “MY FAVORATE BEACH SPOT”
Reviews.Author: Carmen W
Reviews.Content: Over the labor Day weekend I spent two nights with my teenage granddaughter and family friends. This is our second stay this year both time where GREAT. The staff was able to give us early check in both stays ,this hotel was extremely clean and the front desk staff could not of been nicer or more helpful. They provided discount coupons to local restaurants and gave directions to help us find our way. The pool area is clean with great lounge chairs very comfortable. Would highly recommend for all ages.

Reviews.Title: “Jessica B”
Reviews.Author: Leslie B
Reviews.Content: We just had a wonderful Labor day weekend at this hotel with friends and family. We just wanted a small "Mom & Pop place to enjoy our weekend. My girlfried reccommended the Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn. The rooms were exceptionally clean, we had every thing we needed. The staff were all very friendly. It was just the ticket. The atmosphere is so friendly from the staff to the other guests! The pool area was great and the sunrises not to mention the blue moon rises were 'heavenly'. The hotel is so close to many of our favorite resturants and within walking distance from the pier. Its truley located on a beatiful part of the beach. Our family had such a relaxing time we can't wait to make plans for a return trip.

Reviews.Title: “You know you've found a good place when...”
Reviews.Author: Teresa K
Reviews.Content: ...you can't wait to come back the next time! And such is the case with my family and our trips to Daytona Beach Shores and the Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn! We have been traveling here for years. We used to stay at a nearby hotel, until we found this quaint, cute place. It is smaller than the hotels in the area, but that is exactly what adds to its splendor and amazing customer service. Rooms are always clean, questions are always answered. Staff is available at all times and keeps a vigilant eye on the place. Housekeepers do a great job of making sure everyone is taken care of. I will continue to travel to Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn at Daytona Beach Shores. It is a beautiful, peaceful place just steps away from the beautiful Atlantic Ocean. There's nothing quite like waking up in the morning and standing on the balcony, while checking out dolphin flippers in the distance!

Reviews.Title: “The Best!”
Reviews.Author: Maggie B
Reviews.Content: We've been coming to this hotel since we were kids and it is amazing to come back being older and to see that the clean and friendly environment enjoyed as a child hasn't changed. The rooms are extremely clean and the staff, just as I remember, is friendly and available to answer any questions you may have. The best part for me is the fact that it is right on the beach. Just a few steps down from the pool area and there is sand. Step out in the morning or evening to sit by the shuffleboard area and just listen to the waves or watch the sunrise. Who could ask for more?? The pool is always clean and there is plenty of room near it to lounge around and soak up some sun. All in all every year we have come out the trip has been amazing. It's is always a pleasure planning the next trip to Daytona Beach knowing there is still a lovely family friendly hotel we can stay in.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: Joanna K
Reviews.Content: This hotel is by far the best on the Daytona Beach Shores stretch. It is surrounded by condo/timeshare complexes that just don't offer the same cute environment as this hotel. The staff is absolutely amazing. They are always helpful and all rooms are clean. The beach itself in front of the hotel is a very clean stretch of beach. There is a convenient bus stop right outside the hotel for those of us who do not rent cars. For those who want to be on a beach but do not want to be bothered by youngsters, this part of Daytona Beach is the best because it is further away from the "busy"-ness of the pier, but not too far! It is just a short bus trip away... Or taxi trip - whatever your preference may be. By far, a GREAT choice for your Daytona Beach vacation! I'd say the best!

Reviews.Title: “Great Little Hotel to visit Daytona Beach!”
Reviews.Author: Antonio K
Reviews.Content: We decided to make another stop in Florida after leaving a week of Universal and the like at Disney. We just wanted to rest on the beach before taking the long Auto Train home. This wasn't our first choice, but hotels were mostly booked, so we booked to give it a try. When we arrived, I went to the front desk and thought to myself, "oh brother". The room wasn't ready because were were early, but the extremely friendly front desk receptionist checked me in anyway and promised the room would be ready within the hour. We drove around and came back. Sure enough the room was ready and to our surprise was a NICE room with a great Ocean view and close to the pool for our daughter. It had a kitchenette, separate bath and was huge enough for us 3 to be comfortable. It was easy to get to from the parking lot and cleaned well. The Hotel is not large, but large enough that each room has it's own balcony area and the people around us seemed very friendly and not posh or stuck up. We talked with the cleaning staff the next day and she explained how they don't rush to finish cleaning a room because the management puts no pressure on them, but they strive to do it right every time...music to my ears! That room was cleaned well and they weren't bothersome. I don't know what else you could ask for except room service and who needs it at the beach? The pier was about a mile away and we walked there...AWESOME food. Stay here & enjoy!!!

Reviews.Title: “Very clean and well mainted, excellent service!!!”
Reviews.Author: djc5426
Reviews.Content: This is the best hotel in daytona beach by far!!! The rooms are very clean (and i have OCD) It is run by a family for families. The pool is always clean and everythingg is in its place. The house keepers are very nice, helpful, and efficent. Getting extra towels or whatever else you need is no problem. They even made hot dogs for everyone at the hotel today. If you need a room in daytona... look no farther you found the best. Ps... this is my 3rd year here and its always like this!!!

Reviews.Title: “Weekend getaway”
Reviews.Author: kragosta
Reviews.Content: Me and hubby loved loved loved this place very relaxing...management was great beds were comfy.....pool nice..Walking distance to cracked egg restaurant great food and service.maintenance man found my wallet in parking lot and they returned it to me next day.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Family, Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: Jacki Lee R
Reviews.Content: This family owned hotel consistanly provides a great weeklong stay for our large family and friends. Rooms are clean, well kept, and freshened daily by a diligent and friendly staff. The "O" family strives to make everything right for us every time we stay- providing over and above- like coffee every morning, extra supplies when needed, and tips for the best restaurants/shops/outings in the area. The location on the beach is great, parking is adequate, other guests are mostly families, and the pool is well kept. We recommend it for families looking for a nice quiet week.

Reviews.Title: “Another great visit with family and friends”
Reviews.Author: Cindy P
Reviews.Content: I just stayed here again for the 5th time with a large group of friends. This year we ranged in age from under 1 year old to folks in their 80's. Atlantic OceanPalm was perfect for all of us. The hotel is always very clean and the pool and pool deck are great! We loved all the new deck furniture. This year we had about 35 in our group and have all made reservations to come back next year. My family is already talking about coming back in September! Also, the cleaning staff is top notch here.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect piece of Paradise :-)”
Reviews.Author: Linda K
Reviews.Content: I gave this place a 5!!! This place was perfect! The office manager and assistants were very friendly and helpful. The place was clean and there were people cleaning all the time. Palms Inn was very economical and on a perfect location. There was a diner accross the street and a Publix and Walgreens walking distance from the hotel. The rooms were very nice with a refri and microwave available (there were rooms with small kitchen available). The swimming pool area was fabulous! There was a shower for when you come back from the beach, you can clean up right away. The place was awesome; that's why I gave this place 5 stars!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “It's good for the price.....”
Reviews.Author: Becox87
Reviews.Content: My family all had a good time. We enjoyed the pool, it was clean and the surrounding area was well kept. It was more of a family and elderly crowd which was perfect for us. If you are looking for more activity stay further north. We drove about 5 miles north for things to do at night. The proximity to Publix was nice as we had two efficiency rooms and one standard room so we made some sandwiches for lunch two days. One thing that bugged me a bit was on check out day I asked one of the housekeepers for some towels for my family to shower after a few final hours by the ocean and pool and after arguing with me she finally gave in. I travel extensively for both work and pleasure and have never been grilled like that for fresh towels. Other than that it was an acceptable stay.

Reviews.Title: “Worth Looking Into!”
Reviews.Author: MaryEsterhuyzen
Reviews.Content: Clean! Nice sized rooms, most with great view of the beach, which is just steps away. Has a repeat clientele due to cleanliness and decor of rooms as well as a courteouss and helpful staff. Within walking distance of several good restaurants. Highly recommend you give this hotel a try on your next visit to Daytona Beach.

Reviews.Title: “More than expected....”
Reviews.Author: Nathan T
Reviews.Content: My wife and I decided to take a last minute trip to Daytona last week and since we had never been there before and have other vacations planned for later in the year we decided to do it on the cheap. After searching all the travel sites the best priced room on the beach was at Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn. I even found a coupon online for a walk in special at $59 a night. For that price i didn't expect much but I was very surprised. All rooms were ocean view, even if it was a small view, and even though we were given a room at the front of the hotel closer to the street it was a very short walk to the pool and beach. The room was very clean and had everything we needed and the staff were all friendly and helpful. I will definitely stay there again. A+

Reviews.Title: “The Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn at Daytona Beach Shores”
Reviews.Author: Mikey K
Reviews.Content: We stayed here a few years ago and we knew we wanted to spend our upcoming get-away in July there again. The location is great, the Inn is great and the folks that run it are great.

Reviews.Title: “Thanks! Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn”
Reviews.Author: friskykitten
Reviews.Content: Me and my family had such a wonderful time at your property! Your staff is friendly and helpful, property was clean as always! I loved getting the extra large efficiency this time, the extra dinning space is worth it! Loved the new patio chairs out by the pool..... so comfortable i fell asleep:) Thanks for making our vacation a enjoyable one! This is our second year and we are already discussing the dates for next year.

Reviews.Title: “Great value!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Joyce M
Reviews.Content: We had several rooms for various days. The staff was flexible and welcoming to our eclectic group. The rooms, pool and facility are clean, the price is right, and the view is excellent. We are native Floridians and you cannot and will not find a better deal to match the hospitality and overall quality of this facility. We were at the hotel for about 2 hours on the first day when we booked for Spring break...that says it all!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place!!!”
Reviews.Author: Stacey S
Reviews.Content: This is a nice family owned facility. Very clean and friendly staff. Close to several dining facilities and grocery store. Very quiet rooms. Great price, clean pool, right on the beach. We have already booked our vacation for next year and can't wait! You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Best deal, good choice”
Reviews.Author: travelpr0123
Reviews.Content: This is a clean, family owned and operated, nice motel directly on the beach which is recommended by AAA. The facility is well managed, provides inexpensive and renovated, attractive accommodation. A laundry facility is on site, and an outdoor gas grill can be reserved trough the reception. Wifi is available at no charge. You will enjoy it; I guess there is hardly a better deal on the beach. It would be great if they would provide in-room coffee makers and a breakfast. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Great for Families And Older Couples”
Reviews.Author: Glenn1919
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice and inexpensive place. Our room was very clean and well equipped except for a few missing kitchen utensils, but this was no big problem. The building and the grounds were well maintained. The pool and pool area were clean (great for kids). This was a very quiet location, far enough away from the more active areas but not too far. This is a great beach location. The friendliness of the staff certainly contributed to our enjoyable stay. We will be coming back.

Reviews.Title: “Great place with great view!”
Reviews.Author: BillMu3467
Reviews.Content: We had friends register here for bike week. Given it was bike week the pickings were slim but the reviews were good. We were not let down. The front desk was super friendly and responsive to anything we needed. Even the taxi company they recommend was a great. All rooms are angled toward the water, a nice layout for waking up to an ocean view. They were clean and surprisingly well maintained for a building so old. The AC is really cold which is nice if you are there in the middle of August. We were a little ways from main street but we were there to ride a little and when we didn't the cab was very reasonable. Note also that the cracked egg across the street is really good and really close. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience,”
Reviews.Author: MWF179
Reviews.Content: Such a clean, personal experience. All of the staff are so pleasant, professional and helpful. Both the rooms and grounds are so clean. Beautiful ocean front pool and a view from our room. We will definitely return there for all our Daytona vacations. GREAT, GREAT, GREAT!!!!

Reviews.Title: “A clean place that is quite reasonable!”
Reviews.Author: FloridaHoney
Reviews.Content: My husband and I looked at the remarks about this place and decided to give it a chance. This is an older property, nothing fancy, but clean and neat. And most of all, a really good value! A plus for an older building is that the walls are usually poured concrete, which means you don't hear everything going on in adjacent rooms. Very quiet! You can choose to get a room with a kitchenette, or one with just a microwave and small fridge. We even met people who had been coming here for 28 years and staying for a whole month. That's loyalty!

Reviews.Title: “Great place!”
Reviews.Author: SarahKMann
Reviews.Content: My fiance and I stayed here for a week in September. It's a great room if you're just staying there for a few days and you're not staying in the room all too often. The beds were nice, clean - the staff was friendly. Our only problem was that there is no night staff. The room next to ours had the alarm going off all night - which we heard from 1am to about 8am. Other than that, the room was always clean, and having the hotel right on the beach was wonderful!

Reviews.Title: “best vacation”
Reviews.Author: didi024
Reviews.Content: Well we are here for 7 weeks , We are back every year , we enjoy the place because it is clean , family oriented , people are very friendly, staff are amassing , we have all we need ,stove, frige, microwave, coffee machine , toaster, the beds are so comfy you do not want to get up and the ocean so close at night you open the windows and you sleep with the sound of the ocean can ask for more . And another important thing the prices are good . So come and see you will enjoy it too .

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel with a great price”
Reviews.Author: kimberlyparker5252
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for one night just to get away from life.... My room was big and almost every room has a view of the ocean. The room was the very clean and the staff was very nice upon my check in. The pool area is great and the beach is I just a few feet away. The only thing is that is wish they would extend their check out time with out charging a fee, I need to stay and extra hour. But i will stay here agin.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap, easy beach access, rooms clean, what else you want?”
Reviews.Author: lakedog66
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the last minute at the Atlantic Ocean Palms on the south end of Daytona Beach Shores. Don't get this confused with Ocean Palms that is farther north and a much higher building. This is a two story motel with basic rooms. Tile floors that can be slick when wet, and beds and a bath. If you are expecting a full service hotel with hot breakfasts, toiletries, and other amenities, you will be disappointed. This is a BASIC MOTEL people. You know, room, bed, bathroom, sink, TV. It does have a refirgerator and a microwave (which was something the Hard Rock in Orlando didn't have) and comfortable beds. The room also has a small table and chairs. Again, BASIC!!! Now the advantages. The pool has an 8 foot deep end and a shallow end. Nice!! Shuffleboard court, and a sitting porch with umbrellas. An outdoor shower to make sure you don't track all the sand in with you, which is an impossible feat. and a direct stairway to the beach. The beach is very nice, and is wide and beautiful. There isn't alot of shells on the beach, and the surf was nice too. There is a gas grill up front, but we didn't use it. When we got there, my biggest fans were quite friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable and well priced”
Reviews.Author: edenridge75
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for just a night on a quick tour of Florida. Whilst nothing spectacular, the hotel offers clean, functional accommodation at a reasonable price. Right on the beach and a nice pool. Can recommend the Cracked Egg Diner opposite the hotel for a great breakfast!!

Reviews.Title: “Good choice for a family on a budget”
Reviews.Author: Ectheriot
Reviews.Content: Nothing outstanding, but a good choice for people who spend more time on the beach than in their room. Excellent location, clean rooms, clean pool, good value, what else could you ask for?

Reviews.Title: “Best beach hotel!”
Reviews.Author: maria m
Reviews.Content: I was so happy staying here. Beautiful hotel right on the beach. Clean, big room with a new comfortable bed to sleep in. Staff was willing to go out of their way to help with anything they could. This was my first time in Florida and Daytona Beach & I am so glad I stayed at the Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn. I felt like a was a very special guest, and from talking to other people staying there, I was not the only one who felt this way. The hotel was close to shops and restaurants, and the bus stop is also right next to the hotel. I had a nice view of hte ocean from my room and I loved sitting by the pool and hearing the ocean waves! Thank you Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn for making my stay so special.

Reviews.Title: “Great affordable hotel on the beach.”
Reviews.Author: Pstreet
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 3 nights, would recommend to anyone. Rooms are big and clean and the staff are so helpful. Would definatly stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent again”
Reviews.Author: Slouchman
Reviews.Content: Excellent in all respects. Do not confuse this with the Atlantic Resort Ocean Palms, which is a dump. Highly recommend this motel.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Everything I Wanted”
Reviews.Author: mikesgal333
Reviews.Content: Best Place Ever. So Clean and Owners were Great! Trying to plan next trip now!! I will be back after I recover from all the sun!! Price right on !

Reviews.Title: “Very nice, clean & quiet, we will be back”
Reviews.Author: wilsonshirla
Reviews.Content: I took a chance booking when I found the Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn on line and it was the best chance I have taken. This is a fantastic place, very friendly people running the Inn. My daughter & I really enjoyed our stay. It was clean, & quiet unlike some of your bigger hotels that are usually very noisey. We had a room with the full kitchen and it was very nice and very spacious. The pool was just the right size and clean and right on the beach. Couldn't have asked for more. The price was also right. I will stay here again when I return to Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: kasiak3
Reviews.Content: Perfect place to stay in Florida. Our family can't wait for our next trip

Reviews.Title: “One of the best places to stay in the Daytona Beach Area”
Reviews.Author: anannini5
Reviews.Content: I would like to thank everyone from Housekeeping to Management at Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn for the great vacation I had. I received a comfortable, clean, and spacious room. The bed was comfortable-I heard they added new furniture and mattresses to all of the rooms. The room was smoke-free. The pool and ocean front area at the Inn was very relaxing as well. I received a lot of useful information about Daytona Beach activities from the helpful and courteous staff at the Inn. One of the activities the Management recommended was the Ponce Inlet Lighthouse and Inlet. The Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn is a great place to stay for the whole family and vacationers.

Reviews.Title: “Best on the Beach”
Reviews.Author: poolbobber
Reviews.Content: The service was great and the rooms were super clean, Year after year. Love the south Daytona Beach location. The Pool is clean and inviting. Our clan loves it......after all we are the "Chattanooga Bobbers"

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to go again!”
Reviews.Author: live2shop4
Reviews.Content: This was our first trip to Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn and Daytona. We can't wait to go again and we will definitely be staying at the Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn. The staff is great and the rooms are very comfortable. It is very convenient to be able to come back from the beach or pool to have a snack or meal in your room.

Reviews.Title: ““Just an excellent, relaxing place to Stay!””
Reviews.Author: scirocco88
Reviews.Content: Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn – A great place to stay. The family owned motel takes pride in their service and cleanliness, close to stores, restaurants and fishing pier. The property, room, pool and pool area are very clean, well maintained and there are lots of chairs, umbrellas and loungers. Free Wi-FI. We enjoyed sitting on the balcony, relaxing and enjoying the spectacular clean beach. With the economy the way it is, the rooms with their full kitchenettes was perfect for our Breakfast and lunches. Our children had choices in using the heated pool or walking down the steps to the clean ocean beach. What a relaxing place to stay! The staff and other people staying have been very friendly. It's very family oriented place. I've noticed that the same people stay there time and time again. We plan on staying here again. Thanks to the AOPI family.

Reviews.Title: “best decision ever made, complete ease of mind,thank you for your hospitality”
Reviews.Author: TENNISOLIVIA
Reviews.Content: To Whom It May Concern, A decision to plan your stay at Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn will be very rewarding in all aspects of having a fantastic vacation at the beach. Yours Truly, Ed & Shirley Dabkowski

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, good value & on the beach!”
Reviews.Author: Wana_Go_Everywhere
Reviews.Content: Stayed during raceweek. Great location for the speedway and to enjoy the beach too. Has a pool & free wifi. It was a bit more expensive because of raceweek but still great value. The best thing was the service - 5* and so impressive!

Reviews.Title: “We just got home and are already planning to go back.”
Reviews.Author: terri227
Reviews.Content: We selected Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn because it looked clean and it was on the quiet end of Daytona Beach. The place is small but it is on the beach and the price was right. The person behind the desk answered our questions and checked us in for one night. She was pleasant and attentive. We got to our room and found it to be roomy and clean. We extended our stay another night before we took off for dinner. The hotel was quiet at night. The staff was efficient and friendly. Each morning when we left our room, people were sweeping the parking lot and patio area and cleaning the pool. There was a barbeque grill available for guest use. We ended up staying for a total of 3 nights. We just got home and are already planning to go back.

Reviews.Title: “great vacation ,clean ,marvelous ,spacious”
Reviews.Author: didi024
Reviews.Content: This is a marvelous place . The best staff and management , we enjoy it so much that this year is our 5th years there . We stay from 6to 8 weeks and we feel like home . The place is clean and friendly ,Can't wait to get back there in dec 2010. Anybody that loves to be close to the beach will love it there .

Reviews.Title: “Friendliest motel on the beach”
Reviews.Author: Rodger1944
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here for 1-4 weeks in January for over 22 years dating back before the current owners and name. This place is clean, well maintained and the staff is very friendly and appreciate our business. The Ocean Palm is located just minutes from all the great attractions of Daytona and a short drive to Cape Kennedy. We will not go to Daytona if we can't stay here. You'll love the people and this motel.

Reviews.Title: “Family-run, friendly staff on beautiful beachfront”
Reviews.Author: AshAshB
Reviews.Content: Perfect place to stay on the beach if you are looking to relax and enjoy surrounding attractions. This family-run hotel goes above and beyond in accommodating their guests' needs. In addition to a friendly staff, this hotel is conveniently located on the beach in close proximity to many local restaurants. We enjoyed walking on the shore to Crabby Joe's for breakfast one morning. Overall, you are getting a great value by staying here.

Reviews.Title: “A great value hotel that is extremee;y clean and friendly”
Reviews.Author: PTSUKAL
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a place to stay on the ocean in Daytona Beach look no farther than the Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn. The owners and help were very friendly and courteous. They keep the rooms immaculately clean. It is a fantastic value for the money. We will definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “we believe we found a little gem”
Reviews.Author: charlesnbetty
Reviews.Content: we have stayed at many hotels/motels in daytona . this year we found THE ATANTIC OCEAN PALM INN. we have already visited there twice the second time with friends and were more than satisfied. the hotel is small around fifty rooms, is family owned and run. the rooms are well furnished and along with the facilities are very clean and well maintained there is good parking a good pool and of course the hotel is on the beach. we will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn is PERFECT!”
Reviews.Author: docsgirl
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this motel many times in the past years and it has never been a disappointment! This is a small family owned and managed motel and they truly care for the guests and the upkeep of the property. Please be careful when reserving your stay because there is another motel a few miles north that has almost the same name....but there is absolutely no comparison!! The rooms at Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn are always clean and smell wonderful. The beds are very comfortable and extra pillows are always available. We have stayed in the standard rooms and also the ones with a full kitchen. Spending last Christmas and New Years here was truly a joy. The pool and pool deck are always clean and there is a large sundeck oceanfront. The best part for us is that they allow pets in ground floor rooms and they understand that our pet is "part of our family"! The room cost is always reasonable. I hope that they never change anything due to progress or popularity.....it is perfect just the way it is!!

Reviews.Title: “Quiet spot on the Beach”
Reviews.Author: Louis4fun
Reviews.Content: Just returned from two nights in Daytona Beach and stayed at the Atlantic Ocean Palm. What a quaint little place. Right on the beach on the south end of the beach. I was fortunate enought to get a room overlooking the beach and watched the sun rise from the window. Room was clean and spacious and even had a kitchenette if I needed it. It is also right across the street from one of my favorite earteries in Daytona Beach - The Cracked Egg. I have only eaten breakfast there but the owners are friendly and you can't beat the Fried egg sandwich. If your looking to get away this fall, I would highly recommend the Atlantic Ocean Palm - they had great rates posted for after Labor Day.

Reviews.Title: “Average motel in a great location”
Reviews.Author: yummy817
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel after reading all the ravings on tripadvisor. I was not as impressed as the other reviews have indicated. I stayed at the standard, two double bed, room. I cannot speak for the other rooms. Let me list the pros and cons of this place. Pros - Location, location, location. The motel is located right by the beach, and just hopping out of the motel room to go for a stroll on the beach was great. - Price: I payed about $70/night for this place. In the location its in, $70/night over the weekend is a pretty good deal. - Spacious room: The room had two double beds and was very spacious. - Nice view: All the rooms have a partial ocean view. It seems like most of the hotels in the area have it set up that way though. - Free wireless: You can ask the front desk and they will give you the password for connecting online. Do not pay for it!! - Microwave and fridge - Pool: There is a heated pool Cons - Its a traditional motel, nothing fancy. The door leads directly outside, and the only window in the room faces directly to the outdoor hallway. Hence, if you wanted to see the ocean from your window, you will be sharing the view with anybody that walks past your room in the hallway. You can't help yourself but glance into someone's room when walking past an open window... - Hard bed: Somebody had noted in a previous review that the bed was hard, but the manager had written back saying something about changing all the beds. Well, people have personal preferences on how hard the bed is, but boy was it hard! It was very uncomfortable. My friend's bed was a little softer, but it was super noisy! Every time she would switch positions, the bed would creak keeping us awake! - Make sure you bring your own shampoo/conditioner. They will only give you a bar of soap. There was nowhere to hang the hand towel since there was no rack. - Shower was really weak, and it did not drain well at all. We had to wait in between showers for the shower to drain. - You have to pay $10 for the second car if you come separately - No coffee maker or continental breakfast. Supposedly, you can get free coffee if you go to the lobby. Our room was one of the farthest rooms from the lobby, so it was not taking our sleepy heads for free coffee. All in all, the location was great, and it was probably worth the money for location alone, but I would probably pay a little more and go to a different hotel. It seemed like people with family really enjoyed staying at this motel, so I would recommend it to families with children who are on a tight budget. If you want a romantic getaway, use your money and go somewhere fancier!

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!”
Reviews.Author: Maliboozinit
Reviews.Content: This place reminded us a lot of staying in the Keys...you are on the southern end of Daytona Beach, so it's not crazy busy. Access to the beach is nice. It's an older hotel, but very clean & had no issues. Pool and bathrooms are a little small, but is not a big deal for the price of the hotel. Overally we really enjoyed our stay & will be back for sure! Front desk staff was great - got there 2 hours early & had no where to go due to a big thunderstorm...they were able to let us check in early!

Reviews.Title: “my new vacation home”
Reviews.Author: SLADE1966
Reviews.Content: Our family decided to stay another day because this place is great. Great management. We like the fact that there is only 3 floors and we have a 5 star view and distance from beach. We have only been here 3 days, but would love to make this place home. You WILL LOVE the easy access to beach and the pool. It sure beats going down 10 floors and the many mazes of those skyscraper type hotels. Service is second to none! Will will be back next year for a much longer stay!

Reviews.Title: “Super clean, comfortable and very affordable...very well run Property”
Reviews.Author: batemane1
Reviews.Content: If your looking for a quick affordable get away to Daytona Beach Florida then this is the place to stay. I am a travel agent and visit Daytona often and would highly recommend this Hotel to anyone. It is right on the Beach in a safe convenient location........and is spotless. It is not a fancy property but it is very nice and highly recommended...... Elaine Pierce Elaine@elitetropicaltravel.com

Reviews.Title: “The Best Place Ever!”
Reviews.Author: friskykitten
Reviews.Content: I loved vacationing here.......the rooms were very clean.........!....And the staff were very helpful and pleasant ....., they knew great local spots for us to visit...and dine out....! Will i come back again.......YES....! I'm scheduling to come back around Labor Day Weekend! thanks for everything.. :)

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: Anderson_InGreg
Reviews.Content: My family stayed at this place last year in july 2009 and liked this place.Very clean and close to stores ,restaurants and fishing pier.Going back this July and am looking forward to it.Also stayed in July 2007 and had a great time.Each time I've been there the staff and and other people staying have been very friendly.It's very family oriented place.I've noticed same people stay there time and time again.

Reviews.Title: “For money - ok.”
Reviews.Author: tammyabbott
Reviews.Content: The location is great. The rooms were clean. The only thing I have to complain about are the beds. I can say without a doubt - the most uncomfortable beds I've EVER slept on. I would not stay again because of the uncomfortable beds.

Reviews.Title: “Just an excellent, relaxing stay.”
Reviews.Author: joannePR
Reviews.Content: Found this Inn through an ad at Florida Welcome Centre and am glad we did. The price was very reasonable. The property, room, pool and pool deck were very clean and well maintained. The staff were pleasant and helpful. It was very relaxing to be on the beach which is not so busy at this end but was absolutely beautiful. Has a very family oriented flavor. Looking forward to being able to go back.

Reviews.Title: “I plan on staying here again”
Reviews.Author: marktripper
Reviews.Content: it was a very pleasant stay. Everyone was very helpful. the quality was better than at bigger hotels that I have stayed at.

Reviews.Title: “spotless and a great value. Karen, Barrie ontario”
Reviews.Author: Karen10000
Reviews.Content: Went for a week but wished I could have stayed longer. Very clean with a heated pool and right on the beach. Go for a walk or just sit and watch the world go by. Will go back for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Hidden Gem”
Reviews.Author: TheBurleys
Reviews.Content: My husband and I took our nine month old son for an overnight trip to the beach. As previous long time residents of the area, we were shocked to find this hidden gem. It is an older hotel, but the staff and location make up for it. It is very clean and steps from the ocean. The hotel is in a quiter area of A1A, so don't expect lots of bars and restaurants. We will definetly return to this hotel in the future.

Reviews.Title: “This is the best family friendly place on the beach!!”
Reviews.Author: Elle1515
Reviews.Content: We spent half of our vacation at the Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn and the other half at an Orlando theme park resort. The overall consensus among our family was that more fun was had at the Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn! The rooms were clean, the proximity to the beach was great, the pool was beautiful and the staff members were so nice. We will be back next year!

Reviews.Title: “Clean Family Run Establishment - Would Stay Again”
Reviews.Author: OntarioFamilyGuy
Reviews.Content: Stayed a week at this older, but very well kept property. Family run with all amenities including free hi speed wifi, heated pool (was too cold to use it, but looked extremely clean and well cared for). Three floors with rooms opening onto common balconies on each floor, but we liked this as it allowed us to meet our neighbours. There is also an elevator that made luggage transfer much easier. We had a large efficiency with a pretty near full size fridge, toaster, microwave, oven/range dishes, coffee maker (need to supply your own coffee, but there is also free coffee by the cup available at the office). This allowed us to take it easy in the morning and breakfast at our leisure and saved on food costs. Housekeeping did a good job daily on the room. Very basic soap/shampoo, but plenty of clean white towels. Washer and dryer available, so saved on packing by doing laundry mid way thru the week. Nice location in Daytona Beach Shores, a little off the hype and drama of Main Street Daytona, but still plenty of amenities nearby including a couple of lounges, liquor store, short drive to supermarket and pharmacies and within walking distance of Sun Glow pier. Nice quiet property suitable for small families. If you're coming to party, you won't be happy, in fact, I was very impressed and relieved to see the night manager turn away a van full of college jocks who were upset because they weren't allowed to jam 8 of their drunken buddies into one room for the night. The location on the beach is also nice, allowed for some great early morning walks. This stretch of beach allows cars, but we didn't find this to be a hassle, in fact we enjoyed sitting on the balcony and watching the parade in the afternoon. There was still plenty of room for walking/playing on the beach and shell hunting early in the morning. Don't know when we'll get back to Daytona again, but if/when we do, would definitely give this place another look.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed our stay”
Reviews.Author: half-Brit
Reviews.Content: This motel is obviously not new, but is extremely well maintained and very clean and tidy. We opted for one of three "oceanfront" rooms and our room had a fantastic view of the beach and ocean through a huge picture window. The room was quite large with a full kitchen and free wifi, and the cost was a very fair $100 per night at the end of October. We did miss having a private balcony, although there is a sitting area along the front shared balcony. The pool is right on the ocean, and there were chairs all around there. The motel is very quiet and well insulated - we never heard any of our next-door neighbours or the people in the room above us. The only thing that was not top-notch was the laundry room. It was clean, but there are only two washers and two dryers, and apparently the dryers are quite slow. I waited and waited for another guest to finish drying his laundry, but finally gave up! However, there is a laundromat just a mile or so away, so I was able to dry our clothes there. We had a pleasant stay here and would return again if we are ever in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Biketober Fest (very nice and clean place to stay)”
Reviews.Author: Wilder5
Reviews.Content: This was a great place to stay. Staff was very nice and provided extra towels. You could see your bike from the hotel. I seen trailers parked in the parking lot as well. The room was huge and held 4 people easily. It had a kitchen and the bathroom was large. It looks as if it was renovated and done nicely. I would defintely stay again. It was very far out was the only down side. You did have a little pub in front of the hotel. A nice breakfast place and resturants in walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: bjr2001
Reviews.Content: My friend and I just had a wonderful stay at the Atlantic Palm in at Daytona Beach Shores. The rooms were very clean and the staff was friendly and accommodating. So were the owners, when you broke a corkskrew they would get you one right away. All the comforts of home. I recommend this hotel highly with reasonable rates and friendly service. Just a short walk to a heated pool and the beach. A great place to stay!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay! Excellent value /property is maintained . .”
Reviews.Author: deere755
Reviews.Content: This is a family run hotel and they do a really good job of mainting this property. We enjoyed a very refreshing 10 day stay. This family takes pride in their bussiness and it shows! I don't think you can get more for your money anywhere in Daytona. We met some really nice people there and made some friends including the owners. I would recommend this vacation spot to my friends! Danny Williams

Reviews.Title: “Exactly what I was looking for!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: vacationnovist
Reviews.Content: I had never stayed at the motel. I made reservations based off reviews online. It was everything I wanted and my Mother and Grandmother were pleased and felt safe. The price was good, rooms were clean, other guest were friendly and courteous, and we were right on the beach. The front desk was also helpful and polite. I was amazed that in off season they still paid attention to the details like sweeping the sand from the stairs that lead to the beach. I would absolutly recommend this motel to anyone looking for a great price, clean, quiet, safe, place right on the beach.

Reviews.Title: “ripped off”
Reviews.Author: emsandy
Reviews.Content: be careful if you stay here and pay with a debit card. i was charged $75 for 2 damaged bed sheets my dog destroyed. i dont mind paying for the sheets but $75 is a bit rediculous. i also was not notified before they charged my account which caused 2 other purchases to bounce. i was charged fees for these & wasnt reimbursed a dime. because i had pets, i also didnt use their maid service one time.

Reviews.Title: “The Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn - Our Home Away From Home!”
Reviews.Author: dumas007Indiana
Reviews.Content: My wife and I just returned from our 5th stay at the Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn in Daytona Beach Shores, Florida. Each of our stays is 10 days long, so after spending 50 days with them over the last few years, we believe we can give an accurate review of the motel. What keeps us coming back each year most importantly is it’s location. The southern area of Daytona Beach is known as Daytona Beach Shores. The area is away from the crowds and heavy traffic found in central Daytona’s Boardwalk section. Secondly, because it is a smaller, family-owned and operated motel -you have the benefit of dealing with the same friendly people on each visit. We’ve even had the same maid service each time! A wonderful young lady named Kimberly is readily available to attend to our needs. Other reasons to stay at the Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn include: 1. Spacious, affordably-priced efficiency apartments 2. Very clean, well-maintained grounds and rooms 3. Friendly family atmosphere 4. Beautiful ocean views from the pool area and sundeck 5. A choice of more upscale jacuzzi suites 6. It’s location within walking distance of several restaurants 7. Free wi-fi internet access (even in the pool area) 8. Comfortable beds 9. Optional, tile-floored pet friendly rooms 10. A feature that we’ve come to appreciate over the years is that establishments like this one attract a type of customer we enjoy being around. We have met many fine people and developed friendships with other repeat customers who, like us, return the same time every year. Now that I have listed what you can expect to find at Atlantic Ocean Palm I think it is important to tell you what you won’t find as well: 1. A huge parking garage with tiny parking spaces that makes it a 10 minute trek to get to your room 2. Loud parties next door and teenagers running up and down hallways at all hours of the night 3. Shady looking people hanging around the parking area and elevators 4. An overcrowded pool area with no seating left 5. A disinterested stranger every time you go to the motel desk 6. A bill so big at the end of your stay you feel that you should be made part owner After having read other reviews here, I would like to address some of the complaints made by others such as the lack of private balconies or not keeping the office open 24 hours. I can only respond by saying that if what you want is a high-rise hotel with a marble-lined lobby and impersonal 24 hour room service at double or triple the room rates found at the Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn -then clearly you should go somewhere else. But, if value is important to you; value provided by being efficiently run by attentive family members doing their best -then you should consider the Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn for your next vacation destination.

Reviews.Title: “Never Again - at least not for business travel”
Reviews.Author: Traveler25698
Reviews.Content: When booking a business trip we found the hotels near the location we were working would be full most of the week. This hotel came up with a good rating (4 stars while the Hilton ranked only 3.5) and based on the rate (more than the Hilton per night) I figured it was safe to assume this would be a good hotel for my trip. WRONG!. 1st, this is not a hotel or an Inn. This is a motel. It is way down the road from the main section of town. If it is after dark you check in through a bulletproof security window. The ocean view from the room applied only if I stood at one end of the window and looked out sharply towards the other side. Directly out the window was the side of another hotel. The room smelled strongly of carpet freshener but it was clean. However, it was very simple basic motel furniture. No desk or internet capability for a business traveler. Fine, I can live through this for a night and in the mean time found openings at the Hilton near the venue. Then I found out about the punitive cancellation policy of this hotel. The entire week had been pre-paid at a rate higher than was posted on their web site and higher than the Hilton or two other nice name brand hotels closer to the venue. And they absolutely would not discuss it. Trying to defend this as normal hotel procedure (I have had to cancel / change reservations at hotels all over the country with no problems.) Now I can be particular when I am traveling, but I am reasonable. At $169 per night, I have certain expectations and this facility completely failed to meet them. Then their unwillingness to do anything to remedy the situation was completely unacceptable. I feel like their take was they got someone fooled into booking a room at their premium rates and their was no way they were going to give that up. If I were traveling on vacation with my family this might have been a good motel for $70 to $90 per night. However for a business traveler staying for one week, this was a huge mistake. My co-worker refused to spend even one night here. I ended up spending two nights here then moved to the Hilton @$129/night for the rest of the week. The two don't even compare. I have no idea how this place got a 4star rating unless the owners placed most of the posts that show up on Google Maps.

Reviews.Title: “Great family owned hotel! Good location, great view, very nice people!”
Reviews.Author: NCLoverILNative
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here for the 2009 Daytona 500 weekend. We were able to book the Jacuzzi room with a King Size bed (room 301) with less than two weeks before the event. We arrived at night, but had no problem finding the place. The woman at the counter was very nice and knew exactly who we were when I told her my name, a nice perk to choosing a small hotel. The hotel is directly on the beach and we enjoyed the view from our room right away. The jacuzzi room has a small kitchenette with a dorm-sized fridge, microwave, coffee maker, small sink, and a hotplate and pans under the cabinet. The bathroom is standard hotel fare with the sink outside of the bathroom, and the toilet and shower/tub in a room next to it. The jacuzzi is in the main part of the room with a great view of the big window and of course the TV (flat screen). The king size bed takes up most of the room, while a table and two chairs are off to the side when you walk in. As hotel rooms go, this is pretty no-fuss, but it was very nice and clean. We definitely LOVED the view as the window looks out onto the ocean and the beach, and gives a great view of the sunrise. The location of the hotel is within walking distance of plenty of places to eat, such as Denny's, IHOP, Burger King, and a number of local restaurants. We got some great sandwiches from a pizza joint just up the road called Gator's Pizza. If you're in the mood for a bigger restaurant chain, hop in your car and head over the bridge to endless choices of places to eat and shop. On several occasions, we took the opportunity to walk down the clean, beautiful beach towards a pier about a mile south. You can fish, eat, or just enjoy the views and sounds from there. From what I understand, there are two restaurants on the pier, at least one of which does serve breakfast. We did not take the opportunity to swim in the pool, but I can say that it looked very clean and clear. It's a standard sized pool, no slide or kiddie area, but very nice. There are also several tables and chairs on a patio on the edge of the property. The woman who came to do housekeeping was very nice and happily cleaned up our room as we waited. The gentleman who is the general manager was out everyday doing cleanup of the grounds. There is a very large condominium right next door, but it's actually very pretty and isn't an eye sore and doesn't ruin the view of the ocean. My husband and I were very pleased by this hotel and our stay. We would absolutely stay here again if/when we make it to Daytona Beach Shores again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice location friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: RinkratNY
Reviews.Content: My family stayed here in 2005 & 2007 we were going to stay here in 2008 but Hurrican Fay dropped by.Asked for a refund but they said they could not but worked it out to give me credit untill aug 2010 which i thought was fare.Very Nice location just steps to the beach.Staff very friendly and nice .

Reviews.Title: “home away from home, again”
Reviews.Author: yellowdog1
Reviews.Content: we have been going to daytona for 12 years, but the last 8, three times a year, we are at our home away from home, atlantic ocean palm inn..have been there thru good times, and hurricanes, and had a great experience every time..we have always been made welcome, the hotel and grounds are always spotless, and it is a place i have recommended to many friends and family, who also now visit. you will not be disappointed. the staff is ever helpful, cheerful and can answer any questions you might have. pool is right on the beach, so you can have the ambience without the waves, if you want. easy access to all rooms,which are always cleaned and fresh everyday. we have stayed many areas of daytona and other places before we found this place, and now we never go anywhere else..you will be happy here!!

Reviews.Title: “Don't listen to the bad reviews.....they are great!”
Reviews.Author: hairdresser30
Reviews.Content: I will tell you that I have been going here for 7 years now. They are always clean which is the most important thing to me. Most of the staff is very friendly. There is a guy that just doesn't talk too much which is fine. I don't take it as him being rude, he's just quiet. They have ALWAYS treated my family & myself very well. There is normally anywhere from 7 to 10 people in my family that come down to this hotel every year. I'm a VERY picky person as far as a room being clean and it meets my standards. In fact I have a 3, 2, & a 9 month old and they were crawling all over the room and it was clean enough for me to not worry about it. We were actually going down with some other family members and they were staying at another motel and I thought that we'd go ahead and stay down with them. I read some reviews on here about the other motel having a roach problem. There was NO way that I was staying in that kind of place. Even though I lost our $200 deposit I went ahead and called Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn. Thankfully they got all of us in. I have NEVER seen any roaches or bugs for that matter in this place. I will always stay here I guarantee that! It's like a home away from home!

Reviews.Title: “Did not pass MY White Glove test!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Anne11918
Reviews.Content: I read where they were nominated for a White Glove award. Not by my standards, it was kind of smelly. Another "non-smoking" room that reeked of stale cigarette smoke. The A/C was just squealing, even on low. The bed made a terrible noise because it was a king mattress on top of a wooden box. Big rooms with a complete kitchen.The place did have a great location, great view, grounds were clean and tidy. The desk clerk was sullen and never smiled once, very abrupt with us, no welcome there. She just shoved things at us to be signed and her kids were screaming upstairs. But, don't take it out on your clients, please. I would not stay there ever again. Not worth the money.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay...We will return!”
Reviews.Author: imap316
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at the Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn for a weekend getaway. The girls at the front desk were great, and suggested a great sushi restaurant! : ) The rooms were nice and clean. We had a good sideview from the 2nd floor. (Closer to the ocean) I would definately go back!

Reviews.Title: “dont waste your money!”
Reviews.Author: Discovery00
Reviews.Content: This motel was not what we expected!! My sister and I came to daytona beach for the first time to visit some realtives in September for 3 days and I choose to come here because the rooms looked decent, clean and bright online.. instead we had a MUSTY, SMOKEY room!! and the view was horrible. I wasnt happy at all for what I paid for!! ( I now know to do more shopping around before I pick one place that i thought had reasonable rates but then came to find out I could've got something way more updated and cleaner some place else ) theres no private balconies! The staff were ok, but their male manager was rude and we kinda felt like he was watching over us constantly over by the pool. one of my biggest issues were the rooms were not updated at all! One thing for sure is their pictures are very decieving...I wouldnt recommend this dump at all to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Cute hotel”
Reviews.Author: BeautifulDisaster96
Reviews.Content: Me and my boyfriend stayed there from July 11-July 13th. The outside looked pretty bad compared to the other hotels on the strip but I was confident with the Jacuzzi Suite room I booked so I didn't care. It was very nice. We had room 301 on the 3rd floor. Got a complimentary gift bag with 2 Venus Breeze razors, gum, pepto bismol, Axe shower gel and spray for my boyfriend and a razor for him too. Thought that was very nice. Walked in the room and immediately noticed it smelled of lavender. Nice touch! It was VERY clean and the decor was nice. My only complaint was that checkout was at 12p and we decided we would check out at 11a and just swim for the rest of the day and then head home. I asked the front desk girl if it would be okay if we left the car in the parking lot but she said they had a lot of reservations that day and that the owner wouldn't like it. Mmmkay then. I should've said nevermind, we're gonna go swimming and then checkout at 12p then. LOL. Anyway, nice hotel. Paid around $150 a night though and I didn't think it was worth it for the money. It's only a 3 floor hotel and would've loved to stayed in a huge 8-12 story one. I looked online and some of those are cheaper. Ah well. Nice trip though.

Reviews.Title: “Great Daytona Beach Hotel and Great Price!”
Reviews.Author: Shopping_Lady
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn during a short trip to Florida in September. The property was well maintained, the rooms were clean, and the price was affordable – all things that I look for in a good hotel. The pool overlooks the ocean, which was very relaxing, and the hotel is walking distance to a lot of Daytona Beach activities which was great. We will defiantly come back to the Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn the next time we are in Daytona Beach, and I would recommend to my friends to stay there too.

Reviews.Title: “Small Beachside Lodging in Daytona”
Reviews.Author: AGS_guy
Reviews.Content: The Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn is a nice motel overall. The pool and sundeck areas are nice and well-kept. Rooms were fairly clean and spacious. Rooms on the first floor have tile because the motel allows pets. Rooms on the second and third floors have carpet. All rooms have a northeast view of the beach and ocean. A 10-story condo was under construction next door when we visited in July 2006. There was some noise and the view wasn't all that great, but it was not as distracting as we thought it would be. Maid service was only average, as she never cleaned our tile floor during the week we were there. Other guests complained of having to request that their rooms, whether tiled or carpeted, be mopped or vacuumed. The motel is a family-owned place that is one of fewer and fewer such motels in the Daytona area. It is located about two blocks north of the intersection of South Atlantic Avenue and Dunlawton Avenue, which provides quick access to Port Orange and Ponce Inlet.

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I was appalled at the uncleaniness of this hotel. The view was not ocean front: Just a side view. The view was of a construction site beside us/part ocean. this hotel was frankly dirty and had a unsafe appearance. the front desk is not a staffed 24 hours. the room was not fully stocked with basic toiletries. i called the front desk because of no hot water to shower with, i asked to be called back and did not get a response. however, i was called to be told that i had to check out on time. the brochure and the motel did not appear to be the same. the location of the beach was run down. March 2006

Reviews.Title: “Spectacular Motel!!!!”
Reviews.Author: CancunDreaming81
Reviews.Content: By far, one of the best if not the best, motel type lodging i've ever stayed in. Family ran business. Perfectly clean, nice flooring-sink-bathroom area. Very large room (2 bed queen non jacuzzi room)... Rooms are all partial ocean views...comes with full cable, coffee maker (tho no coffee was avail. in room). Plenty of drawers to unpack ur bags and put stuff in for a short or long stay. Deck is a main thruway, with chairs outside in front of every room... Definitly bigger then ur average hotel room (I was on the 3rd floor room 304, a few rooms from the end towards the beach). There is a very clean pool, patio area to sit out in under the sun. Down the steps from the patio, you are on the beach! No beach left tho, all been washed away, no sand, just smooth dirt pretty much in the general area of this motel. View of the ocean is awesome, staff is very friendly. Price was unreal ($67 w/tax per night) - beats out the Hampton Inn was gonna stay at a few buildings away for $95 a night... No continental breakfast. Pet Friendly. Laundry facility is available for .75c a load and $1.50 for half hour drying cycles. Id prefer to dry the clothes tho or even do clothes at the laundry mat right up the road a few buildings for what i'd imagine to be better drying of the clothes. This place is next to a motel that is no longer in business/vacated, so is a quiet area. Convenient to Burger King, IHOPS, Denny's and morel.... I95 is 5 miles away - close to the motel thru Port Orange... Can also access 95 by going thru Daytona Beach into Daytona down by the race track miles away. Overall, I'd def stay in here in a heartbeat, no 2nd guesses, def deserves to be a top 5 for daytona beach :)

Reviews.Title: “Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn 6/18/05”
Reviews.Author: kribbean
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 4 nights 6/2005. Was afraid it would be another oceanfront dump, so I checked previous reviews on tripadvisor.com. When booking the room I asked about hurricane damage and about recent renovations. Was told all damage was taken care of and that the owners are constantly doing things new to keep the place up. She booked me in a room with newer furnishings. The room was large, with the exception of the typical tub/toilet combo (a bit cramped) and a small sink outside of the tub/toilet area. This was really my only complaint. The vanity top was so small that there was nowhere really to put any toiletries out. A suggestion would be to put a small shelf on either side of sink and a hand towel rack that was lacking. I had to put my toiletries on a shelf above the hangers rack a ways from the sink area. The only dirty things I saw were the top of the coffee maker-full of sugar crystals and the bottom drawer in the fridge needed to be cleaned underneath it. The A/C worked great and shower good pressure. The outdoor pool always seemed to have a slightly sand covered bottom. Lots of families staying here-plenty of southern accents (lots of families from Georgia). Quieter area of Daytona-felt perfectly safe here. Staff not overly friendly. In fact, the only male (perhaps owner) on two occasions (checking out and getting towels) no smiles or conversation-strictly business. Saw a few people with dogs staying here. We were pleasantly suprised that the room had no bad odor. Usually every beachfront hotel has some sort of old, musty smell. I would stay here again if returning to Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Clean is the key!”
Reviews.Author: buddyboyAlexandria
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews about The Quality Inn, we decided to cancell our reservation and stay here instead. Am I glad we did! We liked it so much we stayed an extra night! I would definitely book ahead of time, as they filled up each night. Also, you could ask about a room closer to the ocean, and 2nd or 3rd floor for a better view. We were in room 304 to be exact, and it had a great view. We would stay there again in a heartbeat!

Reviews.Title: “Good Motel!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Its a motel but its better than the average. Its directly located at the beach, has swimming pool and clean rooms with kitchenette. Bathroom was nothing special. All in all ok for 68 Dollars.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect pet friendly place with great rates!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at the Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn and found it to be the most cleanest pet friendly property in Daytona Beach. Other family members of mine also stayed at the inn in different rooms, and loved the fact that the property only had designated rooms in which they allowed pets in. (Some of my family members are allergic to pets : ) ) As far as the staff goes, I found them to be very friendly and very helpful as well. So I would have to say I disagree with the one review which was submitted regarding pet friendly rooms. Because my stay was excellent! I will definately be going back again next year.

Reviews.Title: “Unfriendly Management - Doesn't like Pets”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Ocean Palm Inn because we wanted a beachside pet-friendly hotel. We have a small terrier, and although we paid a fee, he was exceptionally well-behaved, and never made a mess, the manager felt that he had to follow us around anytime he saw us and scold us over the problems our dog MIGHT cause. He himself has dogs in the office- I don't understand why he had to pick on us. After two days, we left. He had become a problem, interrupting us at the pool and beach. Dog never barked, never made a mess? Dog envy? Who cares. He raised his voice at my mother and cursed frequently.

Reviews.Title: “Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn is perfect”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We spent our last holiday at the Inn, and plan on returning this year as well. Clean rooms, beautiful beach, and wonderful people.

Reviews.Title: “Great, CLEAN oceanfront motel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Great view of ocean. VERY CLEAN. Courteous Staff. Prices are fair. Worth checking out!

HotelInfo.Name: Atlantic Ocean Palm Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 3247 S. Atlantic Ave., Daytona Beach, FL 32118
